mapper.sql: select review_no, category title, content, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id, (select count(*) from REVIEW_REPLY where review_reply.review_no = review.review_no) reply_count from review
mapper.insert:
select review_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review (review_no, category, title, content, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id) values (#{reviewNo}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{hits}, #{recommend}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{memberId})
mapper.delete: delete from review r where r.review_no=#{reviewNo}
mapper.select: select review_no, category, title, content, hits, nickname, recommend, reg_date, r.member_id, (select count(*) from REVIEW_REPLY where review_reply.review_no = r.review_no) reply_count from review r, member m where 1=1 and review_no=#{reviewNo} and r.member_id = m.member_id
select count(review_no) from review where member_id = #{memberId}
select review_no, title, content, hits, recommend, reg_date, nickname from review r, member m where r.member_id = m.member_id and m.grade = 'master'
select count(review_no) from review, member where review.member_id = member.member_id and member.grade != 'master'
